Paragraph: In males , SF - 1 participates in sexual development by regulating expression of the polypeptide hormone Mullerian inhibiting substance ( MIS ) .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| Mullerian inhibiting substance (MIS) |

In this paragraph, the only disease entity mentioned is "Mullerian inhibiting substance (MIS)". It is a polypeptide hormone that plays a role in sexual development in males.
